Description: Merit-based scholarships. Automatically considered for Berklee scholarships.

Description: Scholarship awarded to a music major (preferably a pianist) who is from Massachusetts.
Requirements: Sophomore junior or senior with minimum GPA of 3.0. Music major preferably pianist from Massachusetts. Selected through audition. If no Massachusetts music major qualifies open to: 1) pianist from any state/country 2) any music major vocal or instrumental from any state/country. Students with music minor may be considered if exceptional.

Description: Scholarship for junior or senior with a major in music preferably with concentration in music education.
Requirements: Junior or senior with major in music preferably with concentration in music education. Acceptance based on essay (topic: philosophy of teaching music) audition and overall GPA.

Requirements: Matriculated music majors. Must audition. All vocalists and instrumentalists eligible. May be full-time or part-time. May be repeat recipient. Preference given to students who demonstrate financial need.

Description: Pep band scholarships based on ensemble needs and financial needs of student.
Requirements: Based on ensemble needs and financial needs of student. Submit video audition.

Description: Automatically awarded based on audition or interview. No separate application necessary.

Students adding second major or changing majors after beginning classes not eligible for scholarship beyond fourth year. Need-based grant funding available through FAFSA (filing deadline February 15).
